scripts.build-with-nb: find ../Tests/Notebooks -type f -iname '*.ipynb' -not -path "*.ipynb_checkpoints*" | xargs -n1 nb2hugo --site-dir . --section docs/benchmarks/notebooks --template ../Tests/Notebooks/nbconvert_templates/collapsed.md.j2 && npx tailwindcss -o static/css/all.css -i assets/css/main.css -m && hugo
